data.title: Flavor-dependent radiative corrections in coherent elastic neutrino-nucleus scattering
data.meta_description: We calculate coherent elastic neutrino-nucleus scattering cross sections on spin-0 nuclei (e.g. 40Ar and 28Si) at energies below 100 MeV within the Standar
